message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hi Alice, $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only do $140 at this time.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $160, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $160 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $155, but that's my final offer.
I appreciate your honesty, Bob. I can meet you in the middle at $157.50. That's the lowest I can go.
Alice, I'm still not there yet. $155 is my absolute limit. Let's close this deal.
I've already offered you the best price I can, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $157.50. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm going to have to consider other options.
